abstract: Bank of America will likely post another loss when it reports fourth-quarter earnings on Wednesday, as banks continue to grapple with their problem loans and a weak economy.
snippet: Bank of America will likely post another loss when it reports fourth-quarter earnings on Wednesday, as banks continue to grapple with their problem loans and a weak economy.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America likely will post another loss when it reports fourth-quarter earnings on Wednesday, as banks continue to grapple with their problems loans and a weak economy, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Analysts Expect 4th Quarter Loss for BofA
